column4: ubuntu has firefox 4 which does not allow non rfc5746 servers to negotiate with ssl. hence i cant LOGIN to gmail, amazon or even pastebin. how do i install previous versions of firefox??? sigh........
lolwut? gmail works just fine in ff4...
Either way, only way is from mozilla's site
Here's a tarball if that helps: ftp://releases.mozilla.org/pub/mozilla.org/firefox/releases/3.6.17/linux-i686/en-US/firefox-3.6.17.tar.bz2
